Title: Dafeng, the Spirit of Air
Description:
If you listen long enough, the wind will carry the answer to you.

Dafeng, the spirit of air, has been scared from the skies by Zhao-Ren, the Onyx Serpent. He hides within the Chamber of Whispers, at the south side of the plateau.

Go to him. Ji and I will join you there.
ObjectivesText: Speak to Dafeng, the spirit of air, in the Chamber of Whispers.
RewardText: Dafeng looks frightened as you approach, but settles a bit at the sound of your voice.
